column4: Hey, was wondering if I could get some help. I have a bootable USB key (not ubuntu) that I want to boot from, but the grub menu shows no USB and even though I change the boot order in the BIOS it still dosent boot. Anyone know how I can boot from a USB? I have ubuntu and win 7 installed
its not the BIOS, I have changed the boot order there. It always goes to the ghrub menu where I can schoose between ubunutu and win 7
isnt there a key to press while booting to get that menu to show
